title: Noose wand

properties.name: description
properties.value: The noose wand is used in the Hunter skill to catch kebbits while tracking. It can also be wielded. Once a Kebbit has been found, equipping the noose wand allows the character to catch the Kebbit. Without the noose wand, a Kebbit will simply be scared off. The noose wand serves no purpose when hunting Herbiboars. The noose wand can also be used to slice bananas.

Item ID10150

The noose wand is used in the Hunter skill to catch kebbits while tracking. It can also be wielded. Once a Kebbit has been found, equipping the noose wand allows the character to catch the Kebbit. Without the noose wand, a Kebbit will simply be scared off. The noose wand serves no purpose when hunting Herbiboars. The noose wand can also be used to slice bananas.

This item can be bought from the Hunter shops in Yanille and Nardah for 4 coins.

You can also use the level 71 spell Hunter Kit from the lunar spellbook which gives a noose wand, among other hunter items. You must have completed both the Lunar Diplomacy and Dream Mentor quests to use this spell.

[[File:Noose wand detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''noose wand''' is used in the [[Hunter]] skill to catch [[kebbits]] while tracking. It can also be wielded. Once a Kebbit has been found, equipping the noose wand allows the character to catch the Kebbit. Without the noose wand, a Kebbit will simply be scared off. The noose wand serves no purpose when hunting [[Herbiboar]]s. The noose wand can also be used to slice bananas.

This item can be bought from the [[Hunter shops]] in [[Yanille]] and [[Nardah]] for 4 coins.

You can also use the level 71 spell [[Hunter Kit]] from the [[lunar spellbook]] which gives a noose wand, among other [[hunter items]]. You must have completed both the [[Lunar Diplomacy]] and [[Dream Mentor]] quests to use this spell.
